casebody.data:
Submitted on record and briefs February 14, DONALD TODD, Appellant, v. Robert SCHIEDLER, Superintendent, Santiam Correctional Institution, Respondent. (96C10258; CA A91859) 935 P2d 481 Lester E. Seto filed the brief for appellant. Theodore R. Kulongoski, Attorney General, Virginia L. Linder, Soliticor General, and Christine Chute, Assistant Attorney General, filed the brief for respondent. PER CURIAM

reversed and remanded March 19, 1997

Before Warren, Presiding Judge, and Haselton and Armstrong, Judges.
